venue.address_2: Suite 188 - at the end of the pier
venue.name: Fenway Bark

item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at FENWAY BARK!

Fenway Bark is a "pawsome" pet hotel, day care, boutique, groomer, etc, etc, etc. They're air conditioned, they've got plenty of free parking, and they even provide us with our own private room to play in!! The staff is super nice and the views of Boston Harbor are great - you can even watch the planes landing at Logan! So come play from 12PM - 2PM.

From Fenway Bark: For the safety of all our guests, we require that all dogs who use our indoor lawns have all ourÂ  health requirements met - documentation showing up to date vaccinations and a negative fecal float in the past 6 months. Dogs attending must have up-to-date rabies vaccinations. Veterinary records can be faxed to Fenway Bark at 617-507-8271 in advance of the meetup. Intact dogs need to be kept on a non retractable leash for the safety of all guests.

Since this meetup takes place indoors, in an area that cannot divide the Frenchies from larger dogs, we respectfully ask that only Frenchies attend the Fenway Bark meetups. Feel free to bring your Frenchie's canine siblings to the other outdoor meetups in public spaces like Peters Park!

Mandatory dues are $10 per Frenchie for each Fenway Bark meetup, cash only.

Fenway Bark has a great selection of merchandise for your Frenchie. If you spend more then $30 while you are there you will get your $10 meetup fee refunded!! So stock up on your dog food, treats, toys and even stylish collars & leashes.

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you!
Zeek

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: January French Bulldog Meetup at Fenway Bark
